sense.def:
To steer a car, boat, or plane
pomeni upravljati avtomobil, ladjo ali letalo tako, da pelje v pravo smer.

seg.quote: He steered the car through the broad entrance.
The freighter steered out of Santiago Bay that evening.

sense.def:
To steer someone in a particular direction
pomeni nekoga peljati v določeno smer.

seg.quote: He steered me to a table and sat me down in a chair.
